Sin-k provides puzzles though minimalist presentation of oscillation. Tackle it, and enjoy the waves.

Sin-k 是一款极简风格的谜题游戏，主题为「振动」。试着解谜，并享受波浪吧。 It is a minimalist puzzle game. You simply click on the squares, to spread the oscillation through the whole world, trying to lift target square to certain height.

Sin-k 是一款极简风格的谜题游戏，玩家点击屏幕中的方块，即可将振动传递出去。谜题要求特定的方块达到指定高度即可过关。

Download it here.

视频可以在这里查看。
